ai-ja348:1.3_0: Father, when you’re associated with men,
ai-ja348:2.1_0: “The power of the noble ones, Dear,
ai-ja348:2.2_0: I’m the one who begged for every statement.
ai-ja348:4.1_0: one despisesed by desire and ill will.
ai-ja348:4.2_0: a person dispassion for fading away
ai-ja348:4.3_0: don’t cultivate such things as yourself,
ai-ja348:4.4_0: I could have become fixed in existence.”
